start.hero_section.slide_1: Get help from friends you don't know
start.hero_section.slide_2: Help someone make a new start
start.hero_section.slide_3: Offer a newly arrived immigrant a job
start.hero_section.slide_5: Simpler jobs, payment within two weeks

start.job_section.title: New jobs
start.category_section.title: A helping hand
start.category_section.text_1: Do you need help with something as soon as possible? If so, you have an opportunity to help someone else.
start.category_section.text_2: What do you need help with?

start.steps_section.step_2: Get answers from candidates near you
start.steps_section.step_3: Pay when your job is completed

start.instruction_section.slide_2.title: Create your profile!
start.partner_section.title: Our partners
start.partner_section.text: JustArrived is a joint pro-bono initiative designed to help newly arrived immigrants to the Swedish labour market. We are owned by a foundation and is run by an association of companies.

find_assignment.filter.date: Date for job to be done
contact.description: Questions? Thoughts? We'd love to help!

assignment.form.address.validation: Adress där uppdraget ska utföras saknas
assignment.rate.description: We have three wage levels: Minimum SEK70/hr. including VAT, Recommended SEK80/hr. including VAT, and Generous SEK100/hr. including VAT.

assignment.comments.title: Comments

assignment.created.description: Så fort din e-post är bekräftad kommer uppdraget att publiceras.
company.create.title: Skapa konto
company.create.description: Välkommen! För att anlita uppdragstagare på ett bra och rättvist sätt till behöver vi ditt organisationsnummer. För att ta uppdrag behöver du ange ett personnummer eller samordningsnummer.
company.form.name: Company name
company.form.url.validation: Du måste ange en en full url för företagets webplats
company.form.email.validation: Du måste ange en giltig e-post
company.assignments.title: My jobs
company.assignments.candidates.select: Select who you would like to hire.
company.assignments.candidates.select.de: Click on the candidate to view their full profile.
profile.chat.text: Messages will be automatically translated from your language. To ensure that communication is as efficient as possible, we recommend that you use English if possible.
profile.chat.private_message: Here you can send messages to job-seekers. For example, you can provide details about jobs, times, and where to meet.
user.assignment.confirmation.title: Send offer to (Job-seeker)
user.assignment.confirmation.description: har 18 timmar på sig att tacka ja till uppdraget. Om (Uppdragstagaren) inte tackar ja inom 18 timmar kommer du att kunna välja en annan kandidat.
assignment.approve.description: The designated time for the job has expired. To ensure invoicing can take place, and that wages are paid, you and the job-seeker need to confirm that the job has been completed.
assignment.total_cost.title: Total cost SEK (amount) including VAT.
assignment.total_cost.description: "This price includes employer contributions and social costs," "excluding VAT."
assignment.recommendation.title: How do you think the (job-seeker) carried out the job? Provide a star rating, (1-5), and write a review that will be added to the (job-seeker's) profile.
user.create.title: Create account
user.create.description: Welcome! To get jobs and to ensure that everything is done fairly, you need to provide a personal number or co-ordination number.
user.form.ssn.validation: Please provide your personal number as YYMMDDXXXX
user.form.orgnr.validation: Please provide your corporate number as XXXXXXXXXX
user.form.email.validation: Du måste ange en giltig e-post
user.form.password.validation: Your password should contain at least eight characters
user.reset_password.title: Glömt lösenord
user.reset_password.description: Återställ bekräftelse lösenord mail har skickats till
profile.create.title: Create Profile
profile.create.description: Tänk på att en väl ifylld profil ökar dina möjligheter att få uppdrag.
profile.create.notification: Details are saved to your profile and visible on all your applications.
profile.create.confirmation.title: Din profil är skapad
profile.create.confirmation.description: Confirm your email via the link in the email we have just sent you.
profile.created.assignment.pending.email: Yay! You have created a profile and searched for your first job!

As soon as your email is confirmed, your application will be displayed. If an employer sends you a job offer, you have 12 hours to accept it. You'll find the job under My Jobs. This is also where all communication takes place between you and employers.
profile.created.approved.email.title: Your account has been activated!
profile.created.approved.email.descripti: You are now ready to search for more jobs
profile.form.photo: Upload a profile picture by clicking on the camera
profile.form.languages.description: Enter the languages you speak and/or understand
profile.form.education.description: What academic qualifications do you hold?
profile.form.skills.description: List things that you are good at!
profile.form.photo.validation: You need to upload a profile picture
user.apply.confirmation: You have applied for the job!
Vi på Just Arrived håller tummarna. Om uppdragstagaren skickar ett erbjudande har du 18 timmar på dig att tacka ja till uppdraget. Du hittar uppdraget under Mina Uppdrag. Där samlas även all kommunikation som sker med uppdragsgivaren.
user.account.description: Where would you like your wage to be paid when you have completed the job?
user.assignment.company_approved: (Employer) has approved the job. Has it been completed as agreed?
user.assignment.add_reference: The job will now be moved to references in your profile
user.assignment.rejected.detail: Why have you not approved the job?
user.assignment.rejected.confirmation.de: We will process your enquiry and get back to you as soon as we can. with the help of your feedback, we can improve the JustArrived service.
assignment.status.user_application.appro: You have offered this job to (Job-seeker)
assignment.status.applicant.approved: The job-seeker has accepted the job.
assignment.status.invoice: We will send an invoice shortly.
assignment.status.applied: You have applied for this job
assignment.status.applied.description: När din e-postadress är bekräftad kommer din ansökan synas för uppdragsgivaren.
assignment.status.question_asked: You have asked a question about this job
assignment.status.offer: Du har fått erbjudande om att utföra uppdraget. Svara inom
assignment.status.company_approved.appro: (Employer) has approved the job! Has the job been completed as agreed?
assignment.status.company.approve_user: vill garna att du utfor uppdraget
warning.title: Vi är ledsna
warning.description: Din profiltyp har tyvärr inte tillgång till denna funktion.
warning.url.title: Hem
cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.info.title: Om cookies
cookies.info.description: Vi använder cookies av tekniska skäl, för att underlätta användningen av våra tjänster och för att ge dig som användare relevant information när du besöker vår webbplats. Cookies används även för att mäta trafiken på vår webbplats, för insamling av statistik och för att förbättra våra tjänster. Genom att använda våra tjänster godkänner du att vi använder cookies, såvida du inte har inaktiverat dessa genom att ändra inställningarna för cookies i din webbläsare.
